template.name: Template IPMI Script iLO Discovery
template.description:
{$ILO_USER} and {$ILO_PASS} Macros need to be adddd. c.f: https://www.zabbix.com/forum/zabbix-cookbook/37024-hp-servers-monitoring-via-ilo/page2?postcount=21 and https://www.zabbix.com/forum/zabbix-cookbook/37024-hp-servers-monitoring-via-ilo?p=238081#post238081
TODO:
* check for IPMI binaries trigger form issing package * check for checksum of both scripts * check for existence of both scripts in externalscripts folder alert if not found * Web Scenario for not having HTTPS listening or returning something something ILO/HP Does NOT need a cron job so don't create one * put notes on creating ILO user zabbix with password or somethign and a note of permissions - i.e. none

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template IPMI Script iLO Discovery:ipmi_proliant.pl['{#KEY}',chassis,{$ILO},{$ILO_USER},{$ILO_PASS}].str("on")}=0 and {Template IPMI Script iLO Discovery:ipmi_proliant.pl['{#KEY}',chassis,{$ILO},{$ILO_USER},{$ILO_PASS}].strlen(0)}>1
trigger_prototype.name: Server not powered on

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template IPMI Script iLO Discovery:ipmi_proliant.pl["{#KEY}",sensor,'{$ILO}',{$ILO_USER},{$ILO_PASS},discrete].diff(0)}>0 and {Template IPMI Script iLO Discovery:ipmi_proliant.pl["{#KEY}",sensor,'{$ILO}',{$ILO_USER},{$ILO_PASS},discrete].strlen(0)}>2
trigger_prototype.name: {#KEY} status changed

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template IPMI Script iLO Discovery:ipmi_proliant.pl['{#KEY}',sensor,'{$ILO}',{$ILO_USER},{$ILO_PASS},discrete].str("Lost")}=1 or {Template IPMI Script iLO Discovery:ipmi_proliant.pl['{#KEY}',sensor,'{$ILO}',{$ILO_USER},{$ILO_PASS},discrete].str("Non-redundant")}=1
trigger_prototype.name: Fans not redundant

trigger_prototype.expression: ({Template IPMI Script iLO Discovery:ipmi_proliant.pl['{#KEY}',sensor,"{$ILO}",{$ILO_USER},{$ILO_PASS},discrete].str(error)}=1 and {Template IPMI Script iLO Discovery:ipmi_proliant.pl['{#KEY}',sensor,"{$ILO}",{$ILO_USER},{$ILO_PASS},discrete].str(Correctable)}=0) or {Template IPMI Script iLO Discovery:ipmi_proliant.pl['{#KEY}',sensor,"{$ILO}",{$ILO_USER},{$ILO_PASS},discrete].str(fault)}=1 or {Template IPMI Script iLO Discovery:ipmi_proliant.pl['{#KEY}',sensor,"{$ILO}",{$ILO_USER},{$ILO_PASS},discrete].str(fail)}=1
trigger_prototype.name: IML Memory error

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template IPMI Script iLO Discovery:ipmi_proliant.pl["{#KEY}",sensor,{$ILO},{$ILO_USER},{$ILO_PASS},discrete].str("Non-redundant")}=1 or {Template IPMI Script iLO Discovery:ipmi_proliant.pl["{#KEY}",sensor,{$ILO},{$ILO_USER},{$ILO_PASS},discrete].str("Lost")}=1
trigger_prototype.name: Power not redundant

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template IPMI Script iLO Discovery:ipmi_proliant.pl['{#KEY}',sensor,{$ILO},{$ILO_USER},{$ILO_PASS},discrete].str("OK")}=0 and {Template IPMI Script iLO Discovery:ipmi_proliant.pl['{#KEY}',sensor,{$ILO},{$ILO_USER},{$ILO_PASS},discrete].str("N/A")}=0 and {Template IPMI Script iLO Discovery:ipmi_proliant.pl['{#KEY}',sensor,{$ILO},{$ILO_USER},{$ILO_PASS},discrete].strlen(0)}<>0
trigger_prototype.name: Hardware {#KEY} too high

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template IPMI Script iLO Discovery:ipmi_proliant.pl["{#KEY}","sensor",{$ILO},{$ILO_USER},{$ILO_PASS},discrete].str(fault)}=1 or {Template IPMI Script iLO Discovery:ipmi_proliant.pl["{#KEY}","sensor",{$ILO},{$ILO_USER},{$ILO_PASS},discrete].str(fail)}=1
trigger_prototype.name: {#KEY} problem

trigger.expression: {Template IPMI Script iLO Discovery:ipmi_proliant.pl['Firmware Revision',bmc,{$ILO},{$ILO_USER},{$ILO_PASS}].diff(0)}>0 and {Template IPMI Script iLO Discovery:ipmi_proliant.pl['Firmware Revision',bmc,{$ILO},{$ILO_USER},{$ILO_PASS}].strlen(0)}<>0 and {Template IPMI Script iLO Discovery:ipmi_proliant.pl['Firmware Revision',bmc,{$ILO},{$ILO_USER},{$ILO_PASS}].strlen(#2)}<>0
trigger.name: iLO Firmware was changed
